overview: Seon Woo is a poor loan shark who raises his daughter alone. He is swindled by his cousin Min Woo, and even his life is in danger. The solution that came out of his head is YouTube! Gathering debtors who couldn't pay their debts and aiming for a jackpot!  Hungry Monk, a former chef who is in debt due to COVID-19, Vivian, who failed while trying to focus on her boyfriend, Muscle Rabbit, who became penniless while investing to escape his first single life, even Manju, a fraud programmer from Seoul National University. All kinds of people gathered for the YouTube production! They're going to make a hit on YouTube as planned. Will he be able to escape his detestable life?
title: You2bu: Bankrupts' Club
